pkgmetadata.longdescription: # Artificial Brains (ABrain) for PythonC++/Python implementation of fully evolvable Artificial Neural Networks.Uses the ES-HyperNEAT algorithms to *indirectly* encode ANNs with bio-mimeticpatterns (repetitions, symmetry...), large number of neurons and relativerobustness to input/output variations between generations.The API is served in Python and computations are performed in C++.[![Documentation
